content: medium setup row round 3 p to end of round round 1 k3 sl3 to end of lay flat to dry use remaining p1 k1tbl to end of row round yarn to make a pom pom for size large setup row repeat rounds 2 and 3 once round 2 k4 sl1 k1 to end one or more of the hats as p2 k2 to to end of row more of round desired
